content: azurill is here this cute little guy is one of my favorite pokemon and i am very happy to have him here with me now azurill is a very quick and easy project but so very adorable materials to make azurill you will need a crochet hook 2 5mm blue white and black yarn a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing a pipe cleaner for the tail felting wool in pink for the ears and mouth a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make azurill using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook azurill should be about 13cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make her magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase slip_stitch if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
